text:
Paul Kevin Jonas II (born 5 November 1987), better known by his stage name Kevin Jonas or K2, is an American singer-songwriter, musician, actor, businessman and dancer. He was born in Teaneck, New Jersey. He is the oldest member of the pop punk band Jonas Brothers alongside his younger brothers Joe and Nick.
In 2009, he married businesswoman Danielle Deleasa. They have two children.
